summary: This is a male and female outfit, craftable under Dragon (Scale) smithing. 4 pieces: Armor, Helm, Boots, and Gloves.
descriptionHtml:
Edhildils Dragon Priest Armor BBP
Author: Edhildil
06,23,2014
ver1

Please read the whole description before you comment so you understand what this mod is.


[img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/1236/descriptionn.png[/img]

This is a male and female outfit, craftable under Dragon (Scale) smithing. 4 pieces: Armor, Helm, Boots, and Gloves.

Also there are some chests ingame that contain a set of the untempered armor pieces; If your smithing perk is too low
to make Dragon Scale armor You can still get the armor. One place is Shearpoint. Look for the Throbbing Chest.

Male:

Totally buff. Based from Nudes - Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles by Chris57 and FavoredSoul ---- I use the FavoredSoulMeshes in the file options.

It still seemed to work with vanilla textures, but if you want your male to have skin like the screenshot you need this mod.

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?


Female:

The lowerbody has been enhanced in the derrier region (buttock)
for a fuller, rounder profile. The waist is somewhat thinner.
The breasts are medium sized. Weighted for BBP.


The female is a custom body shape, so the weight sliders will not work at all. Why? Because every time I try to use weight sliders with my armor, my computer CTD's. Also, BodySlide doesnt like my shape, and that program is extremely confusing.


[img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/4153/requir.png[/img]

Calientes CBBE body mod installed and running in your game or compatible female textures.

BBP skeleton and animations. No BBP skeleton and you will CTD. (female)

[img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/2482/installa.png[/img]


Unzip Data file to a temporary location
Check folder paths and make adjustments if needed
copy/paste into Skyrim folder.


Uninstall:

Delete datameshesarmoredhildildragonpriest folder
Delete datatexturesarmoredhildildragonpriest folder
Delete Edhildils Dragon Priest Armor .esp in your data folder.

[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8579/creditslo.png[/img]

Caliente for CBBE
Edhildil (the armor mesh, altered textures)
Chris57 and FavoredSoul for Better males


Tools used:
=======
Blender
Nifscope
FRAPS
Microsoft Paint (BMP to JPEG for screenies)


Thanks to all above and to Skyrim Nexus.

[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4562/usaget.png[/img]


If you want to use my meshes in your mod please give the proper credits listed in your mod readme/description. It would also be nice if you sent me a link so I can check out your mod.
author: Edhildil
